metadata.name: System Network Discovery - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects enumeration of local network configuration

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/firewall-cmd')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ufw')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/iptables')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/netstat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ss')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ip')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ifconfig')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/systemd-resolve')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/route')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/resolv.conf'))))

output.summary: Detects enumeration of local network configuration

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1016/T1016.md
